product_name: Louis Garneau Flow Bike Helmet - Kids' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The colorful and fun Louis Garneau Flow helmet protects your little one's head while he or she gains confidence on the bike. Spiderlock Neo fit system customizes the helmet for a perfect fit; adjustment is quick and easy. 11 vents provide great airflow on hot days; inner net keeps insects from getting in. Removable, washable padding offers great comfort. Fun, colorful designs are sure to be a hit with your child. Reflective stickers increase visibility in low light. Louis Garneau Flow bike helmet meets CPSC-ASTM-CEN standards for bicycle helmets. Recommended for children from 5 - 10 years old. Closeout.
short_description: The colorful and fun Louis Garneau Flow helmet protects your little one's head while he or she gains confidence on the bike.
